name: Top-A-Former
description:
In this game each person had his role, one is the Spinning Top, and the other the Rope

As the Rope:

 Drag from the ends, and put it on the hooks to make the top pass over it

Press Q to change the camera view

As the Spinning Top:

Move with the left stick on the gamepad

use Y to jump (but just a little D:;)
